output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240017 is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, directly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement with significant reach (15,000-19,999 impressions) on Facebook and Instagram.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, the post clearly promotes Marcel Ciolacu and PSD as the "complete team" for leading the country, using the campaign slogan "#CaleaSiguraPentruRomania".
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly promotional content, not journalistic material.
6. Personal opinion: While framed as a personal perspective from a director, it's a paid political advertisement with clear campaign messaging.
The post exhibits all characteristics of electoral propaganda: - Has official CMF number - Directly references presidential candidate - Uses campaign hashtags and slogans - Is a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - Clear electoral objective to promote candidate

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number (11240017) - Directly promotes presidential candidate Marcel Ciolacu - Uses campaign messaging and official PSD slogans - Is paid advertising reaching 15,000-19,999 people - Clear intention to influence voters by presenting candidate as part of the "complete team" for leading the country
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie, folosind postarea cu ID-ul 957521712887209 pe Facebook. Postarea, realizata dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, promoveaza explicit candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu si PSD, folosind sloganuri de campanie precum "#CaleaSiguraPentruRomania" si continand numarul oficial de material electoral CMF 11240017. Mesajul are un efect electoral clar, prezentand candidatul ca parte a "echipei complete in fruntea tarii", cu intentia evidenta de a influenta alegatorii. Postarea este platita si a ajuns la un public larg de 15.000-19.999 persoane, demonstrand caracterul sau de propaganda electorala.
